title: Trump moves for global reciprocal tariffs
shortDescription: Donald Trump's planned reciprocal tariffs would match the fees other countries impose on U.S. imports, including tariffs and taxes.

title: Image of fan raising middle fingers at Trump is from 2023 | Fact check
shortDescription: An image of a fan raising middle fingers at Trump is miscaptioned. It was taken at a college football game on Sept. 9, 2023, in Iowa.

title: Tim Walz exploring Minnesota US Senate run
shortDescription: Former VP nominee Tim Walz, governor of Minnesota, is exploring running in 2026 for the U.S. Senate seat that Democrat Tina Smith is vacating.

title: Democratic AGs sue Trump over Musk, efforts to cut government
shortDescription: Musk, Trump say they have a mandate to slash the size of the federal government, but the Democratic AGs argue Congress has ceded too much power.

title: Trump's plan to end USAID put on hold for another week, judge rules
shortDescription: A federal judge extended for seven days his order Thursday blocking Trump from ousting thousands of USAID workers.

title: 'God sent me President Trump': RFK Jr. sworn into Cabinet
shortDescription: The longtime vaccine skeptic and "MAHA" movement leader was confirmed earlier Thursday in a near-party line Senate vote.

title: Republicans look to strip Washington, D.C., of its governing powers
shortDescription: Republican lawmakers introduced a bill to strip D.C. of its governing power, but city officials want statehood instead.

title: Linda McMahon questioned by Senate
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's nominee for education secretary faced questions about federal funding for low-income schools, school choice and more.

title: Tariffs for all: Trump's tit-for-tat trade war
shortDescription: In an escalation of his trade war, President Donald Trump moved to put tariffs on nations that levy taxes and fees that hurt U.S. businesses.

title: McMahon: Ed Dept. 'clearly could not be shut down' without Congress
shortDescription: Here are key takeaways from the confirmation hearing for Linda McMahon, Trump's nominee for education secretary.

title: Layoffs underway as Trump, Musk look to purge federal workforce
shortDescription: Layoffs are underway at multiple federal departments, according to union sources and termination notices reviewed by USA TODAY,

title: Schools, churches sue Trump administration over aggressive ICE efforts
shortDescription: Trump officials say policy change will allow them to target criminals taking sanctuary within churches, repealing a Biden-era sanctuary rule.

title: Senate confirms Brooke Rollins as agriculture secretary
shortDescription: Rollins served in the final year of Trump’s first term as acting director of the White House's Domestic Policy Council.

title: Shapiro files suit, saying $2.1 billion for Pa. held up by Trump freeze
shortDescription: The Pennsylvania governor said state agencies still cannot access the federal fundings as of Wednesday.

title: 'People will fight back': Advocates react to Trump's 'war on DEI'
shortDescription: Advocates of diversity, equity and inclusion, or DEI, are criticizing U.S. President Donald Trump for shutting down government diversity programs by executive order.

title: Trump's FBI pick Kash Patel passes crucial step toward confirmation
shortDescription: Despite Democrats' calls for another hearing, President Trump's nominee for FBI director will now soon be up for a vote before the entire Senate.

title: White House bars AP reporter from press briefing
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's administration said the Associated Press was barred from a press briefing over their style decisions around renaming the Gulf of Mexico.

title: Linda McMahon faces Congress as cuts grip the Education Dept.
shortDescription: Linda McMahon, Trump's pick to lead the federal Education Department, is set to face questions from lawmakers Thursday morning. Here's what to know.

title: 'Total killer': Indian PM Modi set to meet with Trump
shortDescription: On Thursday, when Modi arrives in the White House, he’d be among a handful of leaders visiting Trump in the first weeks of his second presidency.

title: Tax refunds? Social Security? Elon Musk, DOGE could access your personal info
shortDescription: The courts may block efforts by Elon Musk and DOGE to access Treasury's payment system. A huge trove of private data is at the center of the fight.

title: 75,000 federal workers accept President Trump's buyouts as offer ends
shortDescription: About 75,000 federal employees accepted President Donald Trump's buyout offer, which the administration closed to applicants Wednesday night.
